parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.85

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current number of custom sound controllers supported by the engine for the given vehicle (currently 32)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getCustomSoundControllerCount''' vehicle
</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - must be a transport type vehicle (doesn't work on characters or buildings)
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - number of custom controllers
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[getCustomSoundControllerCount]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Sound]], [[setCustomSoundController]], [[getCustomSoundController]], [[getSoundController]], [[getSoundControllerResult]], [[getAllSoundControllers]], [[getEnvSoundController]], [[getAllEnvSoundControllers]]
</value></part></template>
